channel.title: Making blue chat
channel.description: hey i need help coding something, and before u read this sint for the yell command i want to make it where owners can type in blue without having to do cyan:"message here" and when u do cyan and type it shows it blue but yellow in the chat box is there a way u can do it so its blue on top of ur head and also blue in chat box without having to do cyan: aswell this is for regular chat not yell =P and if its possible can u tell me how plz ive asked this before but no1 gives me a solution or the code they make things complicated x_X

item.title: Making blue chat
item.dc:creator: @xxbanditxx xxbanditxx
item.description:
@xxbanditxx wrote:

ExtremeX-Scape™:

It’s client sided look for the chat packet and read over it.

what do u mean i dont understand =P i dont know much about coding etc… i would appreciate it if u told me step by step =P
